title: possibly concerning compiler warnings
body:
by **w.d.hubbs**: 
On gentoo linux, when we do a build, the package manager flags compiler warnings which
it says compile fine but could cause random runtime failures.

It found the following warnings in go:

src/cmd/8c/txt.c:291: warning: array subscript is below array bounds
src/cmd/8c/txt.c:401: warning: array subscript is below array bounds

Can someone take a look at these?

Thanks,

William
